name: Starting
description: The only guaranteed safe room of the floor.
mapIcon: Regular room with a small dot in the centre

name: Regular
description: Your basic dungeon floor room, filled with monsters, chests, and death.

name: Huginn's Shop
description: Huginn is eveyrone's favourite bird-come-diety, offering various consumables and items in exchange for coins.  Every purchase adds the item's coin value to your Muninn Gratitude total.

name: Muninn's Armoury
description: Huginn's metlahead friend, they offer weapons and weapon accessories in exchange for coins.  Every purchase adds the item's coin value to your Huginn Loyalty Card total.

name: Bank
description: Allows you to deposit money to a common fund that can be withdrawn from on future floors or runs.

name: Library
description: A locked room containing a spell or ability.

name: Boss
description: This is where the current level's boss is; only 1 of these spawn per floor.  Kill the boss to proceed to the next level!

name: Blessing
description: A room with a selection of 4 free items, but you can only take 1.

name: Challenge
description: Pull the lever, kill the enemies, claim your reward.  Can be completed 3 times.

name: Golden Chest
description: A room containing a locked golden chest with a powerful item inside.  Sometimes these rooms will contain a damage-dealing passage you can use to access a second chest.
